channel.title: Tag28 on Hugo Search Module

item.title: [zh-hans] Test Post #28
item.description: Hugo Client Side Fuzzy Search Module A powerful, flexible and responsive Hugo client side fuzzy search module built on top of Fuse.js. Features Fast: the demo site built with 10k posts (~30k pages), see also the GitHub Pages workflow. Modes: single search page and modal (auto complete). Fuzzy search by title, summary, headings and content, the content was disabled by default. Flexible and configurable. Built-in responsive, theme-less UI and interactive logic.
